mapper.update:
UPDATE ${memberAddress.tableName} set
id = #{memberAddress.id},
ali_user_id = #{memberAddress.aliUserId},
member_id = #{memberAddress.memberId},
town_code = #{memberAddress.townCode},
city_id = #{memberAddress.cityId},
area_id = #{memberAddress.areaId},
street_id = #{memberAddress.streetId},
community_id = #{memberAddress.communityId},
comm_by_user_input = #{memberAddress.commByUserInput},
address_ = #{memberAddress.address},
house_number = #{memberAddress.houseNumber},
tel = #{memberAddress.tel},
is_selected = #{memberAddress.isSelected},
del_flag = #{memberAddress.delFlag},
name_ = #{memberAddress.name},
version_ = #{memberAddress.version},
city_name = #{memberAddress.cityName},
area_name = #{memberAddress.areaName},
street_name = #{memberAddress.streetName},
community_name = #{memberAddress.communityName},
map_name = #{memberAddress.mapName},
map_address = #{memberAddress.mapAddress},
province_name = #{memberAddress.provinceName},
province_id = #{memberAddress.provinceId},
update_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{memberAddress.id}
